original_text: Javan, Tubal, and Meshech traded with you; they exchanged human beings and vessels of bronze for your merchandise.
korean_text: 야완과 두발과 메섹은 네 상인이 되었음이여 사람과 놋그릇을 가지고 네 상품을 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: Javan, Tubal, and Meshech traded with you
they exchanged human beings and vessels of bronze
